node.description: The stone walls here are bordered in silver-gilt trim, expensive but simple in ornamentation. S'Kra mages come and go from their rooms, absorbed in their studies. The tall stone archway leading into the dormitory hall is heavily carved, bearing graceful Eth'ral'khh glyphs.

node.name: Sho'hhs Migendaniis, Sitting Room
node.description: The ceiling opens into a series of six high vaulted arches, each filled with a leaded glass window offering a view of the gardens below. A hexagonal fireplace dominates the center of the room, flanked by six pillars of carved white stone. Hardwood floor slats, stained a deep chocolate brown, contrast the ivory papered walls and thick cream silk runners that border them.

node.name: Sho'hhs Migendaniis, Korshalhh's Office
node.description: Opening out into a large bay window to the north, the office of the guildmaster's brother is spacious and meticulously clean. Cherry floorboards compliment the slate grey walls, one of which holds a massive framed map of Elanthia. Korshalhh sits enthroned at a large desk before the window, facing the steps, with a narrow steel-railed staircase off to his left.

node.name: Sho'hhs Migendaniis, Kitchen
node.description: Constantly heated by the baking ovens and iron stoves, the air in the kitchen is palpably warm. The only windows are high overhead, mere slits set just below the ceiling to allow for ventilation. Polished stone tiles below ensure that any messes are quickly cleaned, or so that such accidents would be impossible to hide.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Intersecting Hallway
node.description: This hallway forms a hub to the guildhall's structure, rooms branching off in all directions like the spokes of some grand wheel. On the far wall, a heavy banded door stands in stoic contrast to the gently flickering diffuse glow of the entrance portal. A wide carpeted path connects the two doors and a large room to the east. Upon the walls are several large paintings framed in silver and electrum.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Hall of History
node.description: This round chamber serves as the base of a stairwell whose stone steps rise steeply to the second story of the guildhouse. A large variety of wooden display cases, each containing an instrument, line the walls as they curve up and out of sight. To the north, an old and chipped oak door, thick enough to muffle the sound of voices or instruments, leads to the practice room.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Conservatory
node.description: Designed with the air of an amphitheater in mind, three short tiers step down to the center of the room where an antique harpsichord rests. Cushions, chairs, and benches line each tier encircling the instrument. Off to the side, some refreshments have been set out upon a small table next to a large keg.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Library
node.description: Three large, curved tables surrounded by rows of benches form a near-circle in the center of the room, leaving just enough of an opening for a lecturer. Heavy oak shelves line the walls, sagging beneath the weight of books packed closely together in long lines broken here and there by a discarded stein or a forgotten quill.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Practice Hall
node.description: Separated in distance from the conservatory for practical reasons, the practice hall is a more informal room for students and full Guild members alike to relax away from the scrutiny of instructors. It's no surprise that the hall has that lived-in look, with assorted empty bottles and an occasional sleeping student laying about from some overnight escapade.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Upstairs Hallway
node.description: This slender corridor runs the length of the guildhouse, allowing access to elegantly decorated rooms reserved for distinguished guests visiting Muspar'i. Sconces are placed at regular intervals, effectively spreading the diffuse glow of candlelight from one end of the hallway to the other.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Gold Room
node.description: A pair of large brass lanterns have been set upon a low oak table, bestowing a pool of ember-hued illumination upon the soft golden velvet cushions surrounding it. Barely discernable in the shadows, a tall armoire and writing desk stand as silent sentinels to either side of the room's only door.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Crimson Room
node.description: Seated to either side of a polished cherrywood table, deep crimson cushions gently compliment the mahogany and golden hued carpets spreading across the dark stone floor. Sheer silk curtains do little to hinder the wan night's light falling through open casement windows onto a matching cherrywood stool and music stand, subtle reminders of this room's past inhabitants. Framed by elaborately woven tapestries, a simple door leads back outside.

node.name: Bards' Guild, Emerald Room
node.description: Intertwining ivy vines carved from pristine alabaster climb granite trellises in each corner of the room, resembling pale ghosts against the dark, verdant hues of the wall behind them. Twin silverwillow tables bearing neat stacks of parchment stand like islands of calm amidst an untidy heap of plush muslin cushions, which lie in disarray from the room's previous inhabitants. Light from the open casement windows falls upon the door leading to the hallway.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: A road of pale red crushed coral stretches up a slight incline towards the bright edifice of the palace to the north, its minarets and great blue dome shining in the distance. Carefully tended and cultivated greenery has been laid out on either side of the road, sustaining a wealth of life in spite of the harsh climate. Flanked by guardsmen in gleaming armor, a broad gate pierces the wall around the palace grounds, leading back to the city proper.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: Passing between low, thick greenery and beds ablaze with colorful flowers, the crushed coral road follows a great curve between the gate and the palace, both visible in the distance. Delicate scents drift across the quiet way from the purple, red and white blooms amid the plantings. A grove of trees planted before the grand palace offers a shady counterpoint to the harsh desert air that slips in over the walls of the palace grounds.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: Broadening into a small lot as it reaches the palace, the crushed coral road curves away from the doors in two directions. The tall entry facade belonging to Shorka's Palace stretches between a pair of slender, carved stone minarets faced with spiraling bands of polychrome tile. Tall double doors lead into the great building, set back within a niche in the grand facade. Opposite the doors is a grove of trees placed to cast shade over the road.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: The first of the tall minarets bordering the palace's main entry stand not far to the east, resting almost directly on top of the road of crushed red coral. The palace continues to the west briefly before being halted by the outer wall that surrounds the regal structure and the city of Muspar'i alike.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: Blending seamlessly with the the wall's white limestone blocks, the west wing of Shorka's Palace stands proudly. High above are tall windows from which the structure's residents can see the land over which they preside. The edge of the great central dome, visible from many places in the Velaka Desert, peeks out over the wall.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: Exotic desert flora grows along the side of the crushed coral road in well-kept flower beds, accenting the usual drab brown sand with splashes of bright orange and vibrant pink. The blossoms sway in the light breeze that sweeps over the wall and down the path. Beyond a few tangled bushes to the northeasts rests the corner of Shorka's Palace, a subtle reminder to observers of where they stand.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: Wedged between the wall and a grove of shady trees, the crushed coral road is secluded from the world in this narrow pass. The only available glimpse of Shorka's Palace reveals the tip of its recognizable dome, obscured occasionally by the swaying green fronds.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: This crook in the Palace Road brushes up against the wall, closely hugging the curve of the white limestone blocks without ever quite touching. The royal stables are clearly visible along the path's other branch and Shorka's Palace itself stands beyond a grove of trees to the north.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Gates
node.description: The grand wall around Shorka's Palace is divided here by tall iron-banded gates, watched day and night by stoic guards in highly polished armor. A road of crushed red coral curves away from the wall to the north and northwest. Each pale chunk seems perfectly placed, forming a well-groomed path deserving of its role as the Palace Road.

node.name: Muspar'i, Palace Road
node.description: The curving road of pale red crushed coral skirts around the royal stables, kept out of direct sight from the palace by a grove of shady trees. Liveried grooms lead magnificent horses and snorting dakohirdu through their daily paces, exercising their charges with devoted attention and care.

The curving road of pale red crushed coral skirts around the royal stables, kept out of direct sight from the palace by a grove of shady trees. Desolate and empty, the yard stands absent of activity, the animals inside for the night.

node.name: Velakan Trade Road, Before the Palace Gate
node.description: Great iron-banded gates stand tall within the otherwise unbroken barrier of limestone blocks that is the wall around Shorka's Palace. Deep carving in the stone depicts a fearsome cobra, though much of the detail has been worn away by the harsh Velakan environment.

node.name: Velakan Trade Road
node.description: This arm of the trade road, truthfully little more than a sandy path packed down by continuous travel, winds between two rows of small dunes as it stretches out toward the palace gate of Muspar'i.

node.name: Hekipe's Locksmithery, Private Quarters
node.description: Wavering light from a wrought iron candelabrum fights the abundant shadows residing in this small corner, hidden away from the main showroom. Wax drips from the metal branches onto the surface of a circular table, the congealing liquid forming splatter patterns around several items for purchase, obviously selected for an exclusive clientele. Placed under a small wooden shelf, a comfortable-looking, albeit drab, leather sofa fills the entire wall opposite the door.

node.name: Muspar'i, Jail Cell
node.description: A wide swath of thick metal bars, the closest Velaka comes to a forest, surround completely this small circular area. No walls of granite form a communal cell here -- there is nothing save the ring of bars. The ground within the chamber is dirty and in some areas covered in things best not thought about. A dais is visible beyond the bars on the far side of the chamber.

node.name: A Dim Shop
node.description: Wobbling uncertainly just above a crooked shelf is a lantern hanging from the ceiling, making the shadows dance oddly across the walls and giving the room a more claustrophobic feeling than it already has.

node.name: Muspar'i, Behind the Justice Office
node.description: Overflow from the dump floods the shadowy crescent of space between a tall wall and the back of the building. Dimly lit by the city's nighttime haze, simplistic texturing upon the stone reveals several imperfect attempts at defying the judicial authorities inside.

Overflow from the dump floods the crescent of space between a tall wall and the back of the building. In apparent defiance of the judicial authorities inside, graffiti litters the stone, etched with several imperfect hands.

node.name: Muspar'i, Rear Lot
node.description: Sturdy wooden posts frame the small box of land, the fencing intended to provide as much asylum as possible, keeping the area's activity away from the prying eyes of local authorities. A low canvas spreads across one corner to create a section completely overtaken by shadows. Improvised seating in the form of discarded crates delivers a modicum of utilitarian hospitality.

Sturdy wooden posts frame the small box of land, the fencing intended to provide as much privacy as possible, keeping the area's activity away from the prying eyes of the public. A low canvas spreads across one corner to create a section of shaded ground, an unpretentious respite from the scorching heat. Improvised seating in the form of discarded fruit crates delivers a modicum of utilitarian hospitality.

node.name: Muspar'i, Shadow of the Great Gate
node.description: This chunk of land hides in the overwhelming darkness, both from the structural behemoth and the presence of night. Though it is hard to tell precisely due to limited visibility, the lot appears free of unnecessary objects and even the coating of sand upon the ground. Everything about the area exudes separation and discretion.

This chunk of land hides in the absence of light produced by the structural behemoth. No unnecessary objects mar the lot, which appears to receive regular cleaning in an effort to avoid any unwanted attention from the city maintenance workers. Even the ground feels recently swept of its coating of sand, likely to eliminate the crunching of grit from hastened and frequent footsteps.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: Staying close to the city, the road narrows and squeezes past one of the immense corner towers of the defensive wall. Even by day, the crackling bonfire that surmounts all the towers flares atop the highest level of the bastion.

The road narrows here, slipping past one of the immense corner towers of the defensive wall, a shadowy bulk in the night. Firelight bathes the area, cast down from the roaring blue-tinged bonfire that surmounts all the towers.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: The dark grey cyclopean stones of the city wall loom up intimidatingly next to the dusty road that follows its unbroken line. A disused ramp slopes down away from the path, almost certainly leading down to the old quarry that the road overlooks in this stretch.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: The road takes on the aspect of a cliffside path, caught between the bulk of the city wall and the sheer drop into the old quarry to the east. A few marred and discarded stones dragged out of the historic work site create a makeshift guardrail between the road and the open pit of the quarry.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: Making its way around another of the great towers of the city, the road bends to follow the path of the wall and the edge of the plateau. The tread of a foot here occasionally brings forth a crunching sound, as the ground is strangely littered with the shells of sunflower seeds. High above, one of the famed bonfires that mark the towers of Muspar'i flares majestically atop the battlements.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: The dusty track continues to follow the great wall of the city, pounded out by the generational tread of gleaners that were unwilling to stray out into the merciless desert. Sloping gently to the northeast for a number of yards, the ground suddenly drops away sharply towards the vertical, a potent natural barrier between the city and the arid plain below.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: Here at the edge of the dust-strewn rocky plateau the city was built upon, it is hard to imagine anyone thinking it was a choice spot. A vista of rock and sand spreads out to the northeast, the salt-tinged desert inhospitable to all. Huddling in the shadows, a few clumps of sad-looking weeds growing at the base of the city wall are the only sign of life to be found here.

Here at the edge of the dust-strewn rocky plateau the city was built upon, it is hard to imagine anyone thinking it was a choice spot. The vast open space of the desert to the northeast is a black void without light or even sound a few clumps of sad-looking weeds growing at the base of the city wall are the only sign of life to be found here.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: Beneath one of the great towers of the city topped with a roaring bonfire, the road has collected a thick layer of extremely fine dust that puffs up with each step. Amid the myriad footprints of passing gleaners and salt porters are traced the thin slithering lines of desert snakes, investigating the edge of the city and the shadow of the tower.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: As it intersects with the Heke'mhhg river on its journey through the Velaka, the road rises here slightly to accommodate a great brass pipe that passes beneath it. The cylinder allows the water to flow by unimpeded, passing out of sight under the path and palace wall alike.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: The pewter-toned waters of Lake Ratamipak are visible from this promontory, hazy with the constant evaporation that makes it difficult to determine where it ends. Making its way to the lake, the road begins descending to the northwest away from the city's plateau and towards the murky waters.

Even in the dark, the waters of Lake Ratamipak are visible from this promontory, although it has the illusionary appearance of a flat dark desert plain that is spoiled only by a slight movement of its surface. Making its way to the lake, the road begins descending to the northwest away from the city's plateau and towards the murky waters.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: The sand choked plateau is covered by the skeleton of some massive, long dead creature. While much of the monstrousity is still intact, the ground is also littered with white chips and larger bleached fragments of bone that have fallen from the beast over time.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: The plateau's surface forms into a tortured and crumbling expanse of dust and churned earth that could swallow an entire caravan whole and leave little evidence of its passage. All around, bones litter the ground while the huge skeleton blocks most of the sky, but eerily, few animal remains are to be seen.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: This canyon-like route passes beneath a huge spine and rib cage, creating something almost akin to a forest canopy in the way the light from above fails to filter to the ground. Sand and dirt have packed the spaces between the large bone spires, creating unbroken walls to either side, and leaving only two directions accessible.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: This canyon-like route passes beneath a huge spine and rib cage, creating something almost akin to a forest canopy in the way the light from above fails to filter to the ground. Sand and dirt have packed the spaces between the large bone spires, creating unbroken walls to either side, and leaving only two directions accessible.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: This canyon-like route passes beneath a huge spine and rib cage, creating something almost akin to a forest canopy in the way the light from above fails to filter to the ground. Sand and dirt have packed the spaces between the large bone spires, creating unbroken walls to either side, and leaving only two directions accessible.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: This canyon-like route passes beneath a huge spine and rib cage, creating something almost akin to a forest canopy in the way the light from above fails to filter to the ground. Sand and dirt have packed the spaces between the large bone spires, creating unbroken walls to either side, and leaving only two directions accessible.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: Small buzzing insects, similar in appearance to bloated flies or blood-sated mosquitos, hang noisily in the air like a miasmic fog drawn by the strench of death and rot. All around the keep sized skeleton, the sandy ground is churned and covered with fragments of bone.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: The plateau flows out to form a rocky shelf, undercut by wind and erosion, that hangs suspended over empty air to grant an imposing view of the expansive vistas of the Velaka Desert. Perhaps observing the rolling dunes colliding with an infinite sea of sand, the distant walls of Muspar'i, and the craggy range of faroff mountains would be more pleasant to observe from this vantage if not for the stink of death and the monstrous skeleton.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: While most of the ground on this plateau is colored by a mixture of brownish orange sand and bleached white bone, this part bears only the latter. A wide ditch, large enough for the biggest Gor'Tog to fall through were it not mostly filled in by sand, makes the path somewhat treacherous for the careless.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: Bone pillars rise from churned and disturbed earth, like the pale trunks of some massive, spectral tree. The smaller cousins of those skeletal mammoths, jagged spears driven into the ground, claw at the bodies of any unwary passerby that draws too near.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: Bones decorate the table top of this small plateau, arranged in a chaotic pattern of bleached white runes in the reddish sand. A burrowing animal, or something more dangerous, has disrupted the area's level symmetry, leaving holes scattered about the surface.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Walk of Bones
node.description: A lone white skull, the remnant of some mortal race, rests atop a pile of petrified wood. Years of baking and scouring have left the bone bleached and thin, but still it serves as an effective reminder of the desolation of this wasted region of the harsh desert.

node.name: Velaka Desert
node.description: About halfway up one of the massive arms of a huge, star-shaped dune, the landscape of the desert becomes slightly more apparent. Stretching out in all directions further than the eye can see, great sandy mountains are the only decoration on an endless canvas of blowing amber grains, shifting about on a generational timescale. Many of the peaks rise not much higher than this vantage point, though several lift daringly into the sky, as if challenging the desert wind to obliterate them.

This low valley surrounded on all sides by immense, star-shaped dunes is just one of many locations within the expansive Velaka Desert that a hapless wanderer could be forgotten for eternity. No sign of the horizon can be found from the bottom of this basin, edged in on all sides by almost insurmountable walls of loose sand, shifting in the slightest breeze yet refusing to give way. The broad swath of sky overhead only reinforces the image of a hopelessly deep trough in an ocean of sand.

Nearing the midsection of this massive arm which radiates outward from the center of an enormous star-shaped dune, the Velaka Desert stands solemnly desolate under the cover of night. Though the sandy mountain is one in a sea of similar shapes stretching as far as the eye can see, cast in the shadow of darkness it manages to retain a solitary appearance. Still, several peaks rise yet higher into the air, as if challenging the wind to obliterate them before morning.

Dark and oppressive shapes loom on all sides, the shadowy nocturnal visages of the towering star-shaped dunes which dominate this portion of the Velaka Desert, stoic and silent. The horizon in every direction is blocked by the hulking mountains of sand, making navigation by landmark an impossibility, the dunes themselves changing shape in the passing wind. Overhead, visible only over the peaks of the darkened hills, the sky serves as a reminder of the depth of the valley.

The entirety of Velaka spreads out below this colossus of sand, the tremendous height of the mountain towering over all others within sight. From here the famous star-shaped patterns of the dune field are immediately apparent, looking much like an army of immense starfish crawling toward the mountains on the horizon out of a great ocean, leagues away. Unlike many of the other regions of the desert, no telltale signs of life persist here, proving this as the most untouched corner of this barren land.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: A broad patch of ground beside the wall offers travelers a place to rest, away from the traffic of the main road. Chunks of discarded limestone, possibly left here since the building of the city, serve as makeshift seats.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: As it follows the curve of the palace wall, the lightly packed sand of the path suggests its purpose as a scenic byway. Unlike the more heavily traveled trade roads that cross the desert, this trail allows for a leisurely pace while partially sheltered from the sand-laden winds by the wall of Shorka's Palace itself.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: The nearly nonexistent trail to the northeast grows to a respectable path as it progresses to the south. Stray pieces of crumbled sandstone mingle amongst the fine grains of sand underfoot.

node.name: Velaka, Sandstone Bridge
node.description: To the west, the great expanse of briny water that is Lake Ratamipak stretches toward the horizon, the vast salt flat that borders its northern shore glittering in the light of the sun. A sinuous river, appropriate for its namesake, passes beneath the sandstone bridge on its way westward to feed the salty lake. The water trickles by quietly underfoot.

To the west, the great expanse of black water that is Lake Ratamipak stretches toward the horizon, the vast salt flat that borders its northern shore emitting a ghostly glow in the darkness. A sinuous river, appropriate for its namesake, passes beneath the sandstone bridge on its way westward to feed the salty lake. The water trickles by quietly underfoot.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: The imposing wall that surrounds the palace grounds slopes gently to the north and southwest, curving like the body of some great serpent. A small sand dune collects near the crook of the path.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: Sloping away from the high wall, the mighty sand dunes recede into the ground, leveling out as they approach the shores of Lake Ratamipak. The massive body of murky water stands motionless amidsts the shifting sands, hardly a ripple disturbing its surface.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: The dunes seem to shy away from the mighty wall as it curves outward, reaching father into the harsh desert landscape. Far beyond the dunes, the southwestern arm of the Gemfire Mountains stands in the distance.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: A low point between two dunes affords a passing glimpse of the salt lake to the west, and the briny scent carries more freely from it on the wind.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Palace Wall
node.description: Skirting along beside the tall stone walls of the palace courtyard, a barely passable trail is created by the bordering sand dunes that perpetually loom just outside of the city.

node.name: Velakan Trade Road
node.description: As if molded by Hav'roth himself, the dunes to the north part wide, leaving a sloping valley for travelers to approach the palace gate of Muspar'i. Over the gate, the palace roof gleams in the sunlight, just beyond the gently swaying fronds of a tall tree.

As if molded by Hav'roth himself, the dunes to the north part wide, leaving a sloping valley for travelers to approach the palace gate of Muspar'i. Over the gate, the palace roof glitters in the darkness, just beyond the ominous silhouette of a tall tree.

node.name: Velakan Trade Road
node.description: An acrid, briny scent drifts over the dunes to the west on an unrefreshing breeze, carrying with it grains of salt and sand. The creeping dunes of the Velaka surround the road almost entirely, blocking passage north.

node.name: Velakan Trade Road
node.description: Ever changing, the landscape of Velaka stretches out to the south and east beyond the border of the main trade road. To the north stands the high wall of the city, beyond which can be seen the dome of the palace roof. The dunes to the west, though small, are close enough to block further view in that direction.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road
node.description: Despite its well-traveled and productive nature, any sign of civic maintenance upon the road abruptly ends, with little more than a rocky path continuing to the west. Several large stones have been pushed or dragged off the path, but were never carted away. Some idle soul has skillfully carved a stylized representation of a dragon onto the side of the largest stone.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road, Rocky Path
node.description: Clinging desperately to the surrounding stones and life itself, twisted and stunted scrub pines have colonized the area, surviving off the rare gift of moisture from the lake to the west. Ignoring the wonder of life's indomitable nature around them, destitute laborers carrying heavy packs of salt occasionally ascend the path, starting their long trudge back to the city gate.

The hardy scrub pines that have managed to survive and spread on this rocky slope are nearly invisible by night, but their dark shapes soften the hard edges of the sharp rocks and the unmistakable scent of pine fills the air. The area has proven attractive to the local wildlife as well -- rustling noises can be heard as small animals move about, and intermittent calls of night birds also break the silence.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road, Rocky Path
node.description: Just above the shoreline, an irregular patchwork pattern of saltern ponds spread out along the shore of the lake in spots of dull pewter, reflective blue, dun yellow, and bright white dependent on which stage the particular pond is in. Surrounding the road are innumerable rocks covered with a fine edging of salt encrustation from water blown off the lake and deposited here.

node.name: Salt Gleaner Road, Rocky Path
node.description: The road ends here where the salt flats begin, between the poorest of the salterns. Low walls of clay-rich soil divide the irregularly shaped pools of water, fed by a system of tiny canals and moveable wooden chutes that carry salt water from the nearby Lake Ratamipak. The ponds around the end of the road here are furthest from the lake, giving them the least access to water and going through fewer production cycles, making them marginal investments.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Settling Ponds
node.description: At the northern end of the shore, only the most meager of ponds are present. Ill-supplied by the complicated network of waterways, these salterns are among the poorest to be found here, some little more than troughs. Even the crews on the ponds seem less professional, showing an edge of desperation or despair in their sluggish activity.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Settling Ponds
node.description: A cluster of salterns is at the stage of moving its cargo back to the city. Laborers occasionally approach the pathway next to stacks of heavy sacks stained a dusty white, awaiting their loads for the long trudge back to town. In a pool next to the abrupt rise of hills to the east, workers shovel out a layer of sand that has cascaded down into the pond, ruining the current production cycle.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Junction
node.description: A strange contraption squats in the middle of the intersection -- a sort of tall round hut on stilts with a maze of wooden waterways radiating outward. With three spouts along its sides, a large bronze pipe delivers water to the channels.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Settling Ponds
node.description: After years of service, a large pond has been pulled out of the regular rotation for maintenance. Workers repack the soil at the bottom of the pond to reduce leaking, while others laboriously scrape away at the yellow buildup of salt encrustations on the walls. Bypassing the pool for now, water gurgles overhead in a wooden canal suspended on piles of rocks and the odd wooden pole.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shoreline
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Life seems rare even here, despite being the only large body of open water in the entire Velaka, no doubt repelled by the intense saltiness of the lake water.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shallows
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Smooth and level, the lakebed forms an even plane that leads deeper into the nearly stagnant tarn.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Here away from shore, the bottom drops off rapidly, making it difficult to move further out into the lake.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shallows
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Smooth and level, the lakebed forms an even plane that leads deeper into the nearly stagnant tarn.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shoreline
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Life seems rare even here, despite being the only large body of open water in the entire Velaka, no doubt repelled by the intense saltiness of the lake water.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shoreline
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Life seems rare even here, despite being the only large body of open water in the entire Velaka, no doubt repelled by the intense saltiness of the lake water.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Windmill
node.description: A stumpy windmill stands at the shore, its diminutive scale not preventing it from being the tallest object in the vicinity of the irregular geometry of settling ponds. With a slow and quiet thump, thump, thump, the pumps the windmill drives feed the complicated system of tiny canals and sluices that keep the ponds going.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Settling Ponds
node.description: A patchwork pattern of settling ponds blankets the area. Dull and uninteresting to the average eye, they are nonetheless a continuing source of riches and wealth. From these humble beginnings, the extracted salt travels to every corner of Kermoria, putting coin into the pockets of traders along the way.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Settling Ponds
node.description: Strangely organized and tightly packed ponds of various sizes force traffic into narrow, regulated pathways that twist and turn with sudden odd angles. Nevertheless, the paths are often busy with the coming and going of gleaners and laborers who walk unperturbed beneath the water channels and walkways suspended overhead.

Strangely organized and tightly packed ponds of various sizes force traffic into narrow, regulated pathways that twist and turn with sudden odd angles. Nevertheless, the paths are often busy with the coming and going of gleaners and laborers carrying torches who walk unperturbed beneath the water channels and walkways suspended overhead.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Settling Ponds
node.description: The hills end abruptly before the edge of Lake Ratamipak, leaving a narrow pocket of flatland that has been completely covered with ponds to recover salt from the waters of the grand lake. Workers routinely tend the salterns, filling them with water, removing debris from the ponds or harvesting the precious salt.

The hills end abruptly before the edge of Lake Ratamipak, leaving a narrow pocket of flatland that has been completely covered with ponds to recover salt from the waters of the grand lake. Workers carrying torches routinely tend the salterns, filling them with water, removing debris from the ponds or harvesting the precious salt.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Here away from shore, the bottom drops off rapidly, making it difficult to move further out into the lake.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Here away from shore, the bottom drops off rapidly, making it difficult to move further out into the lake.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Here away from shore, the bottom drops off rapidly, making it difficult to move further out into the lake.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. The lakebed dips lower, forcing the hardly moving water to form a small eddy that ebbs and flows into itself.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shallows
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Smooth and level, the lakebed forms an even plane that leads deeper into the nearly stagnant tarn.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shallows
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Smooth and level, the lakebed forms an even plane that leads deeper into the nearly stagnant tarn.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Mouth of the Heke'mhhg
node.description: The cloudy water of the Heke'mhhg River pours into the dark and murky Lake Ratamipak, churning up silt and salt in the process. The process causes a long, serpentine trail to form in the water, reaching toward the center of the lake like a narrow, forked tongue.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River
node.description: Briny water rushes by, sweeping through its narrow desert path like an oily snake. The banks of the river bear telltale saline stains, collected over many years from the murky river that has left them thoroughly encrusted with salt.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shoreline
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Life seems rare even here, despite being the only large body of open water in the entire Velaka, no doubt repelled by the intense saltiness of the lake water.

node.name: Lake Ratamipak, Shoreline
node.description: The water of Lake Ratamipak is dark with a greyish tone, owed to a dense concentration of suspended salt. Life seems rare even here, despite being the only large body of open water in the entire Velaka, no doubt repelled by the intense saltiness of the lake water.

node.name: Saltern Shore, Settling Ponds
node.description: One of the most successful clusters of ponds is located here at the south end of the flat. Workers move quickly and efficiently between tasks, giving the scene an almost mechanical quality. Seated on a raised platform in the center of it all, a plump foreman smiles benignly over his tiny kingdom.

One of the most successful clusters of ponds is located here at the south end of the flat. Workers carrying torches move quickly and efficiently between tasks, giving the scene an almost mechanical quality. Seated on a raised platform in the center of it all, a plump foreman smiles benignly over his tiny kingdom.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River
node.description: Briny water rushes by, sweeping through its narrow desert path like an oily snake. The banks of the river bear telltale saline stains, collected over many years from the murky river that has left them thoroughly encrusted with salt.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River
node.description: Briny water rushes by, sweeping through its narrow desert path like an oily snake. The banks of the river bear telltale saline stains, collected over many years from the murky river that has left them thoroughly encrusted with salt.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River
node.description: Briny water rushes by, sweeping through its narrow desert path like an oily snake. The banks of the river bear telltale saline stains, collected over many years from the murky river that has left them thoroughly encrusted with salt.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River
node.description: Briny water rushes by, sweeping through its narrow desert path like an oily snake. The banks of the river bear telltale saline stains, collected over many years from the murky river that has left them thoroughly encrusted with salt.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River
node.description: Briny water rushes by, sweeping through its narrow desert path like an oily snake. The banks of the river bear telltale saline stains, collected over many years from the murky river that has left them thoroughly encrusted with salt.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River, Under the Bridge
node.description: The sounds of the rushing water echo all around, amplified by the underside of the sandstone bridge. Pale lines of salty residue run along the supports laterally -- a reminder of the highs and lows the water level has reached. At the highest point the river appears to have come to about chest height on a Human, though the marker is quite faded, indicating that it was some time ago.

node.name: Heke'mhhg River, Before the Palace Wall
node.description: Water rushes out through the heavy iron grating in the wall around Shorka's Palace. The protective barrier prevents any creature larger than a small fish from entering onto the palace grounds, and as no fish could survive in the salty river, there is little hope of any creature gaining entrance.

node.name: Velaka, Beside the Heke'mhhg
node.description: In the shadow of the sandstone bridge, the waters of the Heke'mhhg seem tenebrous and oily. A cluster of dead weeds sways restlessly at the river's edge, the dried husks persisting despite all odds.
The shelter of the sandstone bridge deflects most of the Velakan climate. A cluster of dead weeds sways restlessly by the river, the dried husks persisting despite all odds.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: The absence of even the slightest hint of flora and fauna alludes to the environment's unfriendly and unwelcoming nature. Animals wander in unknowingly at night, only to die under the day's callous sun, their remains beaten into dust and swept into the dunes. S'Kra Mur storytellers speak of a great curse upon the land, causing it to remain bereft of life until the end of days.

The absence of even the slightest hint of flora and fauna alludes to the environment's unfriendly and unwelcoming nature. Animals wander in unknowingly at night after suffering the sun all day, only to die and have their remains swept into the shadows. S'Kra Mur storytellers speak of a great curse upon the land, causing it to remain bereft of life until the end of days.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Whorls of sand tumble over the dunes like trained acrobats. Meanwhile, the sun blazes on, oblivious to the dusty mess kicked up in ribbons and sheets by the forceful winds that attempt to blot out the daylight. Sudden blasts of hot air are more common than not in the dreary, treacherous expanse, the disruptions often strong enough to send one falling head over heels.

Whorls of sand tumble over the shadowed dunes like trained acrobats. Meanwhile, the night carries on, oblivious to the dusty mess kicked up in ribbons and sheets by the forceful winds that threaten to obscure the heavens. Sudden blasts of cold air are more common than not in the dreary, treacherous expanse, the disruptions often strong enough to send one falling head over heels into the darkness.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Windswept dunes characterize the land from every possible viewpoint. Only the whooshing sound of sand journeying from one spot to another fills the air aside from the rare scream of a bird in the faraway reaches of the desert. Despite the lack of life, there is never a dull moment, for the dust swirls in a tumultuous dance forever under the hot sun.

Indistinguishable from one another at night, windswept dunes characterize the land from every possible viewpoint. Only the whooshing sound of sand journeying from one spot to another fills the quiet air. Despite the lack of life, there is never a dull moment, for the dust swirls in a tumultuous dance forever under the black sky.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Cruel winds scald and maim the dunes, dispersing the sand carelessly and sloppily. Any footprints are immediately erased by the constant churning of particle-filled air. It is no wonder the S'Kra Mur refer to this place as the 'Lands of Evil,' for the terrain is truly inhospitable indeed.

Cruel winds chill and maim the dunes, dispersing the sand carelessly and sloppily. Any footprints are immediately erased by the constant churning of particle-filled wind, though the tracks would be nearly impossible to see in the dark anyway. It is no wonder the S'Kra Mur refer to this place as the 'Lands of Evil,' for the terrain is truly inhospitable indeed.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: The heat is so oppressive in this wasteland, it is a wonder the sand does not fuse into glass before one's very eyes. Rather, the landscape submits to its punishment, having no choice but to wither under the brutal temperatures and fierce winds. No living thing stands a chance of survival for very long in the grueling environment.

Cold replaces the usual desert clime as if night sucked all the warmth from the air and sand. The landscape stands as a testament to the heat -- submissive to its punishment while staying barren and withered under the brutal temperatures and fierce winds. No living thing stands a chance of survival for very long in the grueling environment.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Wisps of sand swerve over the ground like smoke lingering near its fiery origin. The grains writhe and twitch to reconstruct the plane in water-like movements. Thankfully, the lack of moisture anywhere in the vicinity limits the danger of potential fields of quicksand.

Wisps of sand swerve over the ground like mist hovering above a darkened bog. The grains writhe and twitch to reconstruct the plane in ghost-like movements. Thankfully, the lack of moisture anywhere in the vicinity limits the danger of potential fields of quicksand.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Heat chokes the air, making breathing difficult and labored. The horizon ripples into distorted mirages of imaginary places and beings. One must keep his wits about him at all times, lest he succumb to the desert's malicious trickery.

Cold winds pummel the area, making breathing difficult and labored. The horizon appears depressingly far away, and the blackness feels almost constrictive. One must keep his wits about him at all times, lest he succumb to the desert's deadly deception.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Like the ebb and flow of the ocean tide, so moves the sand in waves upon itself in the desolate desert. The searing wind flip-flops its course as if trying to shake some camouflaged predator, resulting in chaotic zigzags across the dunes. Yet the currents of hot air never exhaust themselves and tirelessly trek across the hilly terrain, leaving only soft whispers in their wake.

Like the ebb and flow of the ocean tide, so moves the sand in waves upon itself in the desolate desert. The stinging wind flip-flops its course as if trying to shake some nocturnal predator, resulting in varied patterns across the dunes. Yet the currents of cold air never exhaust themselves and tirelessly trek across the hilly terrain, leaving only soft whispers in their wake.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Giant dunes perspire fine lines of sand down their sloping sides as if in reaction to the sun's overwhelming heat. The real culprit, however, is likely a simple combination of gravity and wind. Regardless, the mounds slowly fade into the background, diminished by their own dusty sweat, only to be rebuilt by the next heavy, replenishing gust.

Giant dunes perspire fine lines of sand down their sloping sides as if in fear of the desert's nighttime chill. The real culprit, however, is likely a simple combination of gravity and wind. Regardless, the mounds slowly fade into the blackness, diminished by their own dusty sweat, only to be rebuilt by the next heavy, replenishing gust.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Lonely and arid, the desert claims many victims foolish enough to wander into its grasp unprepared. The heights of the towering dunes are matched equally in breadth and scope by the depths of the sunken depressions. Wind molds the landscape with invisible fingers just as a potter shapes a vase, though the sand, while yielding, refuses to maintain any permanent profile.

Black and impenetrable, the desert night claims many victims foolish enough to wander into its grasp unprepared. The grey heights of the towering dunes are matched equally in breadth and scope by the shadowy depths of the sunken depressions. Cold wind molds the landscape with invisible fingers just as a potter shapes a vase, though the sand, while yielding, refuses to maintain any recognizable profile.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Funnels of sand barrel into each other and create translucent curtains that shroud the bleak horizon. Every direction mimics the next in the hazy daylight. Travel becomes increasingly difficult not only due to poor visibility, but also because one's feet are continuously swallowed by the voracious desert.

Funnels of sand barrel into each other and create translucent curtains that shroud the black horizon. Every direction mimics the next in the hazy darkness. Travel becomes increasingly difficult not only due to poor visibility, but also because one's feet are continuously swallowed by the voracious desert.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Tongues of hot air flick the loose grains of sand from their temporary resting places to shower the neighboring dunes with new sediment. Because of the shifting surroundings, many travelers prefer to avoid venturing here, knowing exploration carries a huge risk of getting lost or injured. As fickle and unpredictable as fate, the blustering sand recreates the scenery time and time again.

Tongues of chilled air flick the loose grains of sand from their temporary resting places to shower the neighboring dunes with new sediment. Because of the shifting surroundings, many travelers prefer to avoid venturing here, knowing exploration carries a huge risk of getting lost or injured, especially at night. As fickle and unpredictable as fate, the blustering sand recreates the shadows time and time again.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: No trace of greenery, no whiskers of grass and no clusters of color break the monotony in the seemingly never-ending desert. Instead, the sand covers anything and everything in a relentless attempt to assimilate any foreign objects into the monochromatic scenery. There are no diamonds in the rough here, merely stones turned to dust before even having the chance to shine.

No trace of greenery, no whiskers of grass and no clusters of color break the monotony in the seemingly never-ending darkness. Instead, the sand covers anything and everything in a relentless attempt to assimilate any foreign objects into the monochromatic scenery. There are no diamonds in the rough here, merely stones turned to dust before even having the chance to shine.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: A repetitive barrage of granules and heat ricochets around the mounds like crossbow fire in a ceaseless torrent that makes even the most steadfast traveler check his footing. The swells of sand rise and fall like the chests of a slumbering army. They face the blistering winds' assault with resigned dignity, accepting the inevitable truth that life is fleeting, especially for the likes of a desert dune.

A repetitive barrage of granules ricochets around the mounds like invisible crossbow fire in the night, the ceaseless torrent enough to make even the most steadfast traveler check his footing. The swells of sand rise and fall like the chests of a slumbering army. They face the chilling winds' assault with resigned dignity, accepting the inevitable truth that life is fleeting, especially for the likes of a desert dune.

node.name: Velaka Desert, Migen'hhs Pat'shhry
node.description: Blotches of blue sky occasionally emerge from their hiding places in the sandy clouds blanketing the land. Bulimic dunes hack and cough themselves up into the air with the aid of the scorching wind, regurgitating particles that catch the light briefly before rejoining their siblings on the ground. The effect is disorienting but not without a hint of natural aesthetics only the desert can supply.

Blotches of night sky occasionally emerge from their hiding places in the sandy clouds blanketing the land. Bulimic dunes hack and cough themselves up into the air with the aid of the unforgiving wind, regurgitating particles that float noiselessly amid the darkness before rejoining their siblings on the ground. The effect is disorienting but not without a hint of natural aesthetics only the desert can supply.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: All around you is nothing but sand surrounded by high, craggy walls, with no obvious way out. The walls are too steep to climb, and even if the protrusions didn't appear so lethal, it seems many would crumble under pressure.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: Being in these sands is like being trapped in an oven -- they have spent millennia baking under the hot desert sun and now seem determined to bake you within them. Even worse than the heat, however, is the feeling of something alive eating through your skin.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: The only thing more uncomfortable than the stinging wind, the burning glare of the sun, and the feel of the sands trying to rip a person in two, is the unshakable feeling that beneath the surface, something is consuming the body itself. No matter which direction you move in, though, the burrowing pain remains.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: The only thing more uncomfortable than the stinging wind, the burning glare of the sun, and the feel of the sands trying to rip a person in two, is the unshakable feeling that beneath the surface, something is consuming the body itself. No matter which direction you move in, though, the burrowing pain remains.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: Trudging through the sandpit is an act of exceeding difficulty, as the all-consuming sands snatch at the limbs and attempt to drag bodies below. Here and there, craggy rocks jut up from the swirling mass, offering those unfortunate souls trapped in the pit a momentary respite before the suction of the sands pulls them down to its surface once again.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: Trudging through the sandpit is an act of exceeding difficulty, as the all-consuming sands snatch at the limbs and attempt to drag bodies below. Here and there, craggy rocks jut up from the swirling mass, offering those unfortunate souls trapped in the pit a momentary respite before the suction of the sands pulls them down to its surface once again.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: There's a marked difference between the normal sands outside this pit and the sands within. The sands of the pit have a dry, loose texture and they swirl about like the rapids of a river, consuming those foolish enough to tread within them. More than merely eating away at the skin, though, the sands create the sensation that there's something more alive burrowing within the body. A thick vine crawls along the side of the pit, leading back to the surface.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: All around you is nothing but sand surrounded by high, craggy walls, with no obvious way out. The walls are too steep to climb, and even if the protrusions didn't appear so lethal, it seems many would crumble under pressure.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: There's a marked difference between the normal sands outside this pit and the sands within. The sands of the pit have a dry, loose texture and they swirl about like the rapids of a river, consuming those foolish enough to tread within them. More than merely eating away at the skin, though, the sands create the sensation that there's something more alive burrowing within the body.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: Being in these sands is like being trapped in an oven -- they have spent millennia baking under the hot desert sun and now seem determined to bake you within them. Even worse than the heat, however, is the feeling of something alive eating through your skin.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: Strangely, this region of the sandpit is marked with black weeds sticking above the surface and clinging to the rocky walls. An oozing, tar-like sap coats the plants, already corrupt in appearance, and gives them both shiny and sticky qualities. Despite the vile goo corrupting the pit, the sands continue to swirl all around.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: Strangely, this region of the sandpit is marked with black weeds sticking above the surface and clinging to the rocky walls. An oozing, tar-like sap coats the plants, already corrupt in appearance, and gives them both shiny and sticky qualities. Despite the vile goo corrupting the pit, the sands continue to swirl all around.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit, Beneath the Overhang
node.description: The sickly tar-like ooze seems to have gathered in this isolated corner of the sandpit, and the swirling sands rushing against the rock cliff are thick with the noxious stuff. With the combination of black sap congealing in the sands, rotting black weeds clinging to the stone walls, and the shadowy overhang above formed by the angular corner, light is all but nonexistent in this area.

node.name: Velakan Sandpit
node.description: Strangely, this region of the sandpit is marked with black weeds sticking above the surface and clinging to the rocky walls. An oozing, tar-like sap coats the plants, already corrupt in appearance, and gives them both shiny and sticky qualities. Despite the vile goo corrupting the pit, the sands continue to swirl all around.

node.name: A Quiet Grove
node.description: Smooth, slender trunks reach high overhead and spread out into a covering of small green leaves that shake in the desert breeze with a constant, subdued whisper. The shade of the trees is not very dense, but even that tenuous screening makes the grove seem a dark and murky shelter from the biting wind. Hard-packed and bare of undergrowth, the ground is so clear of debris that it might have been swept.

Smooth slender trunks reach high overhead and spread out into a covering of small green leaves that shake in the desert breeze with a constant subdued whisper. The shelter of the trees is not very dense, but even that tenuous screening makes the grove seem a calm and quiet shelter from the biting desert wind. Hard packed and bare of undergrowth, the ground is so clear of debris that it might have been swept.

node.name: Muspar'i, Royal Stables
node.description: Contradicting the stereotypical image of a stable, this modest room is kept remarkably clean. The freshly swept floors could be mistaken for those in any respectable shop, utterly free of sand and dust. Even the bales of hay stacked between the stable's two stalls are neat and orderly, held in place by a sturdy spidersilk net.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Entryway
node.description: Light filters in through miniscule shafts in the sandstone walls, providing dim illumination by which the entry chamber can be navigated. The narrow hall affords little more space than is needed to walk through into the deeper sections of the temple, with rows of benches on either wall only further discouraging loiterers. What the room lacks in width is made up for by its height the smooth walls gradually come together high above at an acute angle, the uppermost point shrouded in shadow.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Vestibule
node.description: Smooth walls curve gently around the perimeter of the room, forming a modestly spacious conical chamber with a high, vaulted ceiling. A small bargate statue of abstract design stands beneath a brass lantern -- the obvious centerpiece of the area -- the tilework pattern on the floor outlining a walkway that circumnavigates the sculpture. Following the contour of the wall, the path branches out to the north, east and south through narrow hallways.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Library
node.description: A pedestal at the center of the room supports a trio of brass oil lamps, whose frail light is solely responsible for providing enough illumination to read. Woven from long reeds, a pale carpet stretches across the floor between the bare, sandstone walls, dampening sound and reflecting the flickering flames above. Rows of deep shelves are occupied by numerous volumes and grimoires, all attended to and arranged meticulously by the elderly monk seated behind a long, oak desk.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Hallway
node.description: Curving around the perimeter of the temple in a wide arc, the narrow hallway is hedged in by a row of thick columns. Two burning torches rest on the wall in the quiet corner beyond. The stone pillars stand just wide enough apart to allow narrow shafts of pale light into the corridor, dividing the darkness and further enshrouding the unlit portions of the path in seclusion.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Quiet Corner
node.description: Rough sandstone walls and a feeble wooden bench function as the most comfort this desolate sanctuary can offer, eerily characteristic of its patron. The flickering torches attempt to reach beyond to the east and south, blocked largely by the stone pillars that separate the area from the corridor.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Hallway
node.description: Large, stone pillars separate the cramped hallway from a quiet nook in which two torches quietly burn. The radiance of the flickering flames reaches feebly out between the columns, unsuccessful in its task of illuminating the shadowed passage and managing only to subdivide the area into corridors of pale light and pools of tenebrous shadow.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Somber Chapel
node.description: Standing at the center of the oblong chamber that yawns from northwest to south, brass candelabras festooned with desert-thistle wreaths surround a low altar of carved quartz. A fine crack runs diagonally through the glossy stone, splitting it neatly in half, though the two segments remain pressed together. Ghostly tallow candles -- the only permanent light source for the small room -- burn atop their respective perches, working desperately to illumine the paintings that line the curving walls.

Brass candelabras with desert-thistle wreaths surround a low altar of carved quartz with a fine crack runs diagonally through the stone. Ghostly tallow candles burn atop their respective perches, working to illumine the paintings that line the walls.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Guildleader's Alcove
node.description: The stale aroma of dust hangs heavy in the stagnant air, no breeze able to reach deep enough into the temple to disturb this place. High above, light refracts through the colored panes of a stained-glass window, casting pale rays of red, orange and yellow on the smooth walls, sandy floor and oak-framed settee. A creased, calligraphic vellum has been attached to a plaque on the wall.

A musty odor of still air and dust envelops the room, made all the more poignant by the quiet of the desert night. Resting on the arm of an oak-framed settee, a tarnished silver oil lamp casts the glow of its dancing flame out in all directions. The frame of a stained-glass window looms overhead, glinting in the meager light like some odd skeletal guardian. A creased, calligraphic vellum has been attached to a plaque on the wall.

node.name: Cleric Shop, Showroom
node.description: A pair of tiny windows in the vaulted ceiling far overhead capture every errant breeze, transforming the hollow of the building into the bell of a great stone whistle. Low thrumming notes resonate through the chamber and out onto the cobblestone street, carried on the back of swooping gusts that cause the wares on a pair of heavy wrought-iron tables to quiver.

node.name: Ganen Eliza, Cellar
node.description: The walls of the dark, windowless basement are comprised of large sandstone blocks, their age apparent in their crumbling surfaces. A rough floor spreads out beneath an arrangement of wooden tables which play host to the exclusive wares, kept out of the reach of the public. At the far end of the chamber, a cellar door allows entrance into the Guild beyond.

node.name: The Suncatcher
node.description: The Suncatcher barge is made up of a wooden flatboat mounted atop steel rails. An elevated platform at the front of the craft is used by the team of Sand Elves that sail it through the desert ocean by controlling the team of massive yeehars that pull it. The barge itself is full of coils of rope, wooden crates and barrels, and bulging sackcloth.

node.name: Fang Cove, Fate's Fortune Lane
node.description: A towering marble archway opens a gap in the wall to the north and separates the ongoing construction and somewhat more refined completed structures of Fate's Fortune Lane from the crude structures and makeshift walkway along the beach. The entrance to a squat, wide bungalow sits in opposition to the arch, and the sheltering cliffs of Fang's Peak rise up from behind it. To either side of the arch, cobblestones of different shapes and sizes have been laid out to form the wide Fate's Fortune Lane.

node.name: Muspar'i, Street of Craftsmen
node.description: Variegated sandstone tiles pave the broad street which is lined with colorful clay pots that overflow with vibrant desert lotus blossoms, their sweet scents wafting through the area. Several benches rest beneath the leafy fronds of the swaying palms, creating a comfortable spot to enjoy the shade in the desert heat. Craftsmen bustle to and from the ornate mosaic archway that leads to the north while several hawk their wares along the busy roadway.

Variegated sandstone tiles pave the broad street which is lined with colorful clay pots that overflow with vibrant desert lotus blossoms, their sweet scents wafting through the area. Several benches rest beneath the leafy fronds of the swaying palms, creating a comfortable spot to enjoy the shade in the desert heat. Craftsmen bustle to and from the ornate mosaic archway that leads to the north while several hawk their wares in the soft glow of the nearby torches.

node.name: Muspar'i, Crafter's Square
node.description: Beneath the torchlight of the broad square, a few artisans move through the area, their sacks laden with tools of their trade. Small shops with clay tiled roofs are tucked amid the uuryvhh trees along the perimeter, the most predominent being the large whitewashed buildings of Muspar'i's Alchemy Society and Enchanting Society. A wide cobbled path encircles a towering central statue, a trickling fountain at its base.

The broad square bustles with activity as several artisans move through the area, their sacks laden with tools of their trade while some carry wares to be delivered. Small shops with clay tiled roofs are tucked amid the uuryvhh trees along the perimeter, the most predominent being the large whitewashed buildings of Muspar'i's Alchemy Society and Enchanting Society. A wide cobbled path encircles a towering central statue, a trickling fountain at its base.

node.name: Muspar'i, Crafter's Square
node.description: Tucked amid the swaying uuryvhh trees, several small workshops surround the perimeter overlooking the towering central statue encircled by a trickling fountain at its base. Seasoned artisans make their way along the cobbled path, stopping occasionally to discuss business near the doors of Muspar'i's grand Outfitting Society.

Tucked amid the swaying uuryvhh trees, several small workshops surround the perimeter overlooking the towering central statue encircled by a trickling fountain at its base. Seasoned artisans make their way along the darkened path, stopping occasionally to discuss business near the doors of Muspar'i's grand Outfitting Society.

node.name: Muspar'i, Crafter's Square
node.description: A steady ribbon of smoke flutters across the evening sky from the stacks along the tiled roof of Muspar'i's Forging Society, its vast whitewashed walls dominating this portion of the broad square. In the light of the surrounding torches, towering uuryvhh trees hunker over the polished sandstone benches that overlook the grand fountain, a statue of a S'Kra Mur man at its center.

A steady ribbon of smoke flutters from the stacks along the tiled roof of Muspar'i's Forging Society, its vast whitewashed walls dominating this portion of the broad square. Towering uuryvhh trees hunker over the cobbled path, providing a rare bit of shade for the polished sandstone benches that overlook the grand fountain, a statue of a S'Kra Mur man at its center.

node.name: Muspar'i, Crafter's Square
node.description: A few artisans make their way along the cobbled path that encircles the area, some slipping through the doors of Muspar'i's Engineering Society, while others work their way to other buildings along the broad square. A brief breeze rustles through the fronds of the towering uuryvhh trees, creating a slight mist from the central fountain that glistens in the surrounding torchlight.

Several bustling artisans make their way along the cobbled path that encircles the area, some slipping through the doors of Muspar'i's Engineering Society, while others work their way to other buildings along the broad square. A brief breeze rustles through the fronds of the towering uuryvhh trees, creating a slight mist from the central fountain, a welcome repreive from the heat of the surrounding desert.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Reception Hall
node.description: Varicolored striations within the surrounding sandstone walls are incorporated into the decor of the reception hall, creating a harmonious ambience to the area. Placed around the perimeter are rich goldenoak-framed sofas accented with pierced carvings, each cushioned with pillows of Musparan silk in dusky hues of azure, rose and amber. Flowering potted vines hang overhead, complementing the palms and cacti that dot each corner below. Muted conversations can be heard down the eastern corridor, while several artisans bustle through the area, their arms laden with their crafts.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Book Store
node.description: Jeweled brass lanterns overhead highlight a mural of sand-hued dunes with a stylized oasis that decorates one wall of the small book store. At the far end of the room are several bamboo shelves flanked by broad potted palms where patrons browse before making their purchases at the nearby counter.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Corridor
node.description: Slender brass planters mounted near the ceiling overflow with a variety of ivy plants, a few of their long tendrils clinging to the dusky-hued sandstone walls. Framed sketches dot the length of the corridor beneath ornately jeweled sconces, each displaying a uniquely designed image.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Office
node.description: Hanging baskets of supple green ivy cascade from each corner of the small office, a few of their slender vines spidering their way across the varicolored sandstone walls. The occasional ray of moonlight streams in from a large window, highlighting the carved goldenoak desk and rattan, peacock chair tucked behind it. A wicker dress form stands nearby, draped with an opulent Musparan silk gown, accented with brilliant Heke'mhhg lazuli gems along the bodice.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Supply Outlet
node.description: Long swaths of vibrant silk crisscross the small outlet overhead, each sweeping to a central point of the ceiling near a hanging lantern, then out to various points along the walls to drape gracefully to the woven mat that covers the floor. A series of rattan shelves and tables display a vast array of fabrics, leather and supplies as artisans bustle in and out of the area making their purchases.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Corridor
node.description: Jeweled sconces shaped like clusters of palm fronds create plenty of soft lighting, while the supple ivies continue to cascade from their slender planters mounted high on the sandstone walls as the corridor branches in either direction. Clay pots rest nearby, bursting with hearty and colorful purple sage shrubs that fill the area with a light herbal scent.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Tool Store
node.description: A trio of tzgaa orbs hangs overhead, casting a soft glow over the area and a small counter along one wall. The store's perimeter is lined with colorful wicker bins, each piled high with various waxes, tools and notions essential to the local craftsmen. In a nearby corner, a large clay planter overflows with fragrant, flame-red dragon primroses, the redolent blossoms adding a pleasant touch to the otherwise utilitarian room.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Corridor
node.description: Dusky hues of azure, rose and amber are evident within the striations of the corridor's sandstone walls, a multitude of small flecks within the stone glinting in the soft light of the nearby sconces. Sweeping potted palms rest in nearby corners, while an elaborate mosaic underfoot details the crest of the society.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Corridor
node.description: Dusky hues of azure, rose and amber are evident within the striations of the corridor's sandstone walls, a multitude of small flecks within the stone glinting in the soft light of the nearby sconces. Sweeping potted palms rest in nearby corners, while an elaborate mosaic underfoot details the crest of the society.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Weaving Hall
node.description: Sweeping potted palms dot the corners of the brightly painted hall, a hefty loom resting along the far wall. A series of shelves and hooks provide a place for storing supplies when not in use, while a simple workbench and chair nearby invite a leisurely rest and place to enjoy a cool drink.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Weaving Hall
node.description: Sweeping potted palms dot the corners of the brightly painted hall, a hefty loom resting along the far wall. A series of shelves and hooks provide a place for storing supplies when not in use, while a simple workbench and chair nearby invite a leisurely rest and place to enjoy a cool drink.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Weaving Hall
node.description: Sweeping potted palms dot the corners of the brightly painted hall, a hefty loom resting along the far wall. A series of shelves and hooks provide a place for storing supplies when not in use, while a simple workbench and chair nearby invite a leisurely rest and place to enjoy a cool drink.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Spinning Parlor
node.description: Clusters of lush sand verbena cascade from a broad planter hanging overhead, while a vibrant woven rug blankets the parlor's floor. The sound of trickling water from an ornate niche within a nearby wall creates a soothing environment for artisans to practice their craft. A large spinning wheel stands at the back of the parlor, while a large workbench and padded chair rest nearby, providing a place to relax or work on a project that requires more attention to detail.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Spinning Parlor
node.description: Clusters of lush sand verbena cascade from a broad planter hanging overhead, while a vibrant woven rug blankets the parlor's floor. The sound of trickling water from an ornate niche within a nearby wall creates a soothing environment for artisans to practice their craft. A large spinning wheel stands at the back of the parlor, while a large workbench and padded chair rest nearby, providing a place to relax or work on a project that requires more attention to detail.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, Spinning Parlor
node.description: Clusters of lush sand verbena cascade from a broad planter hanging overhead, while a vibrant woven rug blankets the parlor's floor. The sound of trickling water from an ornate niche within a nearby wall creates a soothing environment for artisans to practice their craft. A large spinning wheel stands at the back of the parlor, while a large workbench and padded chair rest nearby, providing a place to relax or work on a project that requires more attention to detail.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Book Store
node.description: A colorful mosaic adorns the surrounding walls with a complex geometric pattern, the brass lantern overhead casting a soft glow upon the bookshelves nearby. Over the vague sounds of hammering coming from beyond the curtained archway, a S'Kra Mur attendant watches over the area as he rests upon one of the plump tasseled pillows at the center of the room. A gilded tray sits nearby, providing refreshments for those who frequent the area.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Hallway
node.description: The muted sounds of anvil work carry through the narrow hallway, the smell of smoke and sweet beeswax filling the air. Several suits of armor line the hallway, a testament to the craftsmanship carried on within the walls of the vast society.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Repair Shop and Storage
node.description: A heavy rope net drapes from the ceiling overhead, while a sweeping potted palm stands in a nearby corner of the brightly painted shop. A long counter stands at the far end of the room, behind which a S'Kra Mur man busies himself with the task of repairing tools and tending to the stored goods on the shelves behind him.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Maker's Mark Shop
node.description: Tzgaa orbs hanging overhead cast vibrant hues over the many workbenches laden with tools and supplies beyond the broad counter. Away from the clamor of the busy lobby and main forging area, future master smiths plot their technique choices as they study the many charts detailing their career options. Several craftsmen huddle nearby as they deliberate over the designs of their soon-to-be-made crafter's mark.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Hallway
node.description: The muted sounds of anvil work carry through the narrow hallway, the smell of smoke and sweet beeswax filling the air. A pair of crossed damascended steel longswords are mounted upon the wall, a testament to the craftsmanship carried on within the walls of the vast society.
