node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Deed Vendor
node.description: Colorful mosaic tiles decorate the walls of the area, while thick steel bars block access to a depot storing a multitude of resources and crafted goods. Using an intricate network of ropes and pulleys, workers hoist the larger pieces atop the rows of massive shelving.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Tool Store
node.description: Several workmen shuffle in and out of the busy shop, hefting heavy oaken crates into stacks that stand along the surrounding walls. A young S'Kra Mur woman tirelessly unpacks the many forging tools, arranging them upon broad tables that rest at the center of the room.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Supplies
node.description: Vibrant pigments adorn the walls, creating a colorful mural that depicts the several stages of the forging process. A S'Kra Mur attendant bustles about the area as he maintains the vast array of stock available on the nearby tables.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Corridor
node.description: An intricate mosaic creates a detailed mural of sweeping palm trees that runs the length of the corridor. Brass lanterns overhead add to the temperature of the hall, which is considerably warmer than the outer areas. The colorful archways to the east and west lead into the various work areas, the sounds of hammering and grinding metal reverberating throughout the area.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Corridor
node.description: An intricate mosaic creates a detailed mural of sweeping palm trees that runs the length of the corridor. Brass lanterns overhead add to the temperature of the hall, which is considerably warmer than the outer areas. The colorful archways to the east and west lead into the various work areas, the sounds of hammering and grinding metal reverberating throughout the area.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Corridor
node.description: An intricate mosaic creates a detailed mural of sweeping palm trees that runs the length of the corridor. Brass lanterns overhead add to the temperature of the hall, which is considerably warmer than the outer areas. The colorful archways to the east and west lead into the various work areas, the sounds of hammering and grinding metal reverberating throughout the area.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Foundry
node.description: Windows high up in the stone walls provide just a hint of fresh air over the stench of burning coal and molten metal. Supported by chains from a wooden beam, a heavy ceramic crucible swings over the fire or over to the molds lined against the wall. Shovels protrude from a pile of fuel nearby, the blackened coal waiting to be added to the fire.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Forge
node.description: A massive iron anvil mounted on a granite pedestal stands in the center of the tiled floor. Against the wall, a iron forge awaits things to heat, casting a reddish glow over the room. Small windows high in the wall and open stacks overhead draw some of the heat outside to mingle with the dusty air.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Foundry
node.description: Windows high up in the stone walls provide just a hint of fresh air over the stench of burning coal and molten metal. Supported by chains from a wooden beam, a heavy ceramic crucible swings over the fire or over to the molds lined against the wall. Shovels protrude from a pile of fuel nearby, the blackened coal waiting to be added to the fire.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Forge
node.description: A massive iron anvil mounted on a granite pedestal stands in the center of the tiled floor. Against the wall, a iron forge awaits things to heat, casting a reddish glow over the room. Small windows high in the wall and open stacks overhead draw some of the heat outside to mingle with the dusty air.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Foundry
node.description: Windows high up in the stone walls provide just a hint of fresh air over the stench of burning coal and molten metal. Supported by chains from a wooden beam, a heavy ceramic crucible swings over the fire or over to the molds lined against the wall. Shovels protrude from a pile of fuel nearby, the blackened coal waiting to be added to the fire.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, Forge
node.description: A massive iron anvil mounted on a granite pedestal stands in the center of the tiled floor. Against the wall, a iron forge awaits things to heat, casting a reddish glow over the room. Small windows high in the wall and open stacks overhead draw some of the heat outside to mingle with the dusty air.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Main Hall
node.description: Ornate mosaics surround the main hall with palette of vibrant colors, the imagery depicting several artisans developing their craft amid decorative arches of sweeping palms and blossoms. A series of tzgaa orbs encircle the room overhead, highlighting the area and several benches that invite a leisurely rest as those bustling through the busy society stop and share their ideas.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Repair Shop
node.description: Clusters of hanging plants dot the corners of the brightly painted azure walls. Bustling back and forth from the shop's backroom, several S'Kra Mur workers carry goods that are either in need of repair or have been completed. Standing near several shelves laden with items waiting to be returned to their owners, the shop's repairman makes notes to a leather-bound ledger as he carefully inventories each piece.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Davattak's Office
node.description: Musky sweet scents waft through the small office from a brass incense burner resting upon a small table in a nearby corner. Vibrant jeweled veins embed the polished stone walls with rich striations, offset by the soft woven mat that blankets the floor. A large potted palm rests at the side of a stately desk with a series of parchments and ledgers stacked on its surface.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Corridor
node.description: Tiny glazed tiles mosaic the floor in a complex geometric design in vibrant hues of rich purple, offsetting the simple whitewashed sandstone walls along the length of the corridor. Large tzgaa orbs dangle overhead from short chains, each highlighting the shop entrances to the north and south.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Stone Outlet
node.description: Several stout workmen grunt under the weight of the rough-hewn crates they heft through the busy shop to the backroom. Heavy blocks of marble and alabaster rest at various points along the sandstone floor, creating a narrow maze amid the additional shelves and tables holding a wide selection of stone and bone.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Crafting Supplies
node.description: Tzgaa orbs mounted in ornate holders along the vibrant azure walls light the shop's many wicker baskets and rattan shelves. Several workers wander in and out restocking the wares while a S'Kra Mur attendant sees to the many crafters who stop by in need of supplies.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Corridor
node.description: Tiny glazed tiles mosaic the floor in a complex geometric design in vibrant hues of rich purple, offsetting the simple whitewashed sandstone walls along the length of the corridor. Large tzgaa orbs dangle overhead from short chains, each highlighting the various entrances to the society's workshops.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Workshop
node.description: Brightly painted walls surround the workshop with a vibrant mural of stately palms, the brass lanterns overhead providing additional lighting during the evening hours. Unfinished stone furniture, statues and more are spread across the surfaces of the dozens of reinforced tables that form neat rows along the length of the room. Several artisans pour over their creations, while attendants haul away other pieces too large to carry with an overhead system of pulleys and chains, storing them for later retrieval.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Workshop
node.description: Brightly painted walls surround the workshop with vibrant color, the brass lanterns overhead providing additional lighting during the evening hours. Unfinished stone furniture, statues and more are spread across the surfaces of the dozens of reinforced tables that form neat rows along the length of the room. Several artisans pour over their creations, while attendants haul away other pieces too large to carry with an overhead system of pulleys and chains, storing them for later retrieval.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, Workshop
node.description: A complex geometric mosaic accents the floor of the spacious workshop, while several artisans tend to their craft at the many tables that line the room. Society attendants bustle in and out of the area, some discussing techniques while others assist in the storage of the larger pieces using a system of pulleys and chains mounted overhead.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Foyer
node.description: Vibrant silks drape the polished sandstone walls amid the many potted plants that decorate the broad foyer. Marbled tzgaa orbs hang overhead, highlighting a pair of thickly-padded benches that surround a low table at the center of the room.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Supply Shop
node.description: A vast array of colorful baskets and earthenware surround the shop, their essences mingling into a variety of sweet, musky scents. Brass oil lamps dangling overhead cast a soft glow over the wide counter below as several S'Kra Mur workers tend to restocking and taking care of the needs of crafters.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Gathering Hall
node.description: Colorful murals are painted along the sandstone walls between the vibrant mosaic arches that lead into the various workrooms of the society. Thick beams sweep to the vaulted ceiling overhead, the rich teak wood carved to resemble towering palm trees and adding to the inviting decor of the circular gathering hall. Lit by the hanging brass oil lamps, woven mats decorate the floor while piles of plump pillows scattered about the room provide a place where many of the crafters rest and share their ideas.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Tool Depot
node.description: Several decorative bamboo shelves line the polished sandstone walls of the small shop, each displaying a variety of alchemical tools. Standing behind a broad counter, a young Elven lass greets the many crafters who stop to make their purchases.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Book Store
node.description: Striations imbed the surrounding sandstone walls with a variety of vibrant hues, the rich minerals glinting in the light. A small shelf advertising available alchemical books sits below a chart on alchemical techniques on one side of the small enclosure, while the other side an exhausted clerk notes work order completions on a board.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Office
node.description: Several bookcases line the richly grained teak wood walls, a thick woven rug padding the polished sandstone floor underfoot. Resting against the far wall of the dimly lit office is a large desk, a tall chair tucked neatly beneath it.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Workroom
node.description: Tiny glazed tiles mosaic the surrounding walls with a colorful array of soaring birds, helping to create a relaxing environment for the visiting crafters who frequent the society. Several potted plants and shelves line the room's perimeter, the tall ceilings and rounded chimneys overhead providing adequate ventilation for any experiments with unexpected results.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Workroom
node.description: Tiny glazed tiles mosaic the surrounding walls with a colorful array of flowering plants and tall palms, helping to create a relaxing environment for the visiting crafters who frequent the society. Several potted plants and shelves line the room's perimeter, the tall ceilings and rounded chimneys overhead providing adequate ventilation for any experiments with unexpected results.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, Workroom
node.description: Tiny glazed tiles mosaic the surrounding walls with a colorful array of leaping fish over an undulating wave pattern, helping to create a relaxing environment for the visiting crafters who frequent the society. Several potted plants and shelves line the room's perimeter, the tall ceilings and rounded chimneys overhead providing adequate ventilation for any experiments with unexpected results.

node.name: The Bardess' Fete, Deck
node.description: Silken rigging suspends the sweeping teak sloop's deck from the semi-rigid envelope above. Shaded silk-cushioned benches along the bow's rail offer comfort and a spectacular view from the ship. A cylindrical copper device, about the size of a large bread oven, snakes a half dozen tubes upward into the bottom of the segmented balloon. Aft of the device, the quarterdeck rises to elevate the ship's wheel, while beyond, a cherrywood door marks the entrance to a small cabin. To the left of the door hangs a framed painting, and to the right is a small porthole.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Foyer
node.description: Brightly colored mosaics surround the walls of the small foyer with images of cloaked figures with hands raised overhead, the myriad of color further emphasized by the glow of the marble tzgaa orb overhead. A pair of cushioned camel-backed love seats surround a low rattan table that provides snacks and refreshments to the many crafters and visitors that frequent the society.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Corridor
node.description: Vibrant mosaics continue along the long corridor with images of various enchanters working their craft. Adding a measure of decoration, potted plants are placed at varying intervals, lit by ornate lanterns overhead.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Gathering Hall
node.description: Vibrantly painted sandstone surrounds the gathering hall, the walls punctuated with rune-shaped wall planters spilling over with vines of rich green ivy. Lit by ornate brass lanterns overhead, piles of large satin pillows surround a low wicker table with a slender glass hookah upon it, the redolent scents of citrus and berry wafting throughout the area.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Bookstore
node.description: Ornate bookshelves surround the store, their shelves overflowing with a variety of old and new tomes and carefully rolled scrolls. A short assistant pores over several of the selections, while a cloaked S'Kra Mur attendant tends to the needs of visiting artisans from behind a rattan counter.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Supply Store
node.description: Vibrant walls of teal blue and lush hanging plants surround the shop with color, while a small curtained window looks out over the nearby square. In the rosy hue of the overhead lanterns, a young S'Kra Mur attendant sees to the organization of several shelves of scrolls and supply bins that stand along a far wall, beyond a long rattan counter.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Society Master's Office
node.description: Cascading to the floor in each corner, rich swaths of silk scallop the upper walls in swags of jewel-toned color that complement the golden hue of the sandstone walls. Two thickly-padded armchairs angle towards an ornately carved writing desk along a far wall, providing a place for the Society Master to meet with various members and see to official paperwork. The heavy scent of sandalwood drifts from an incense burner on a nearby cart.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Tool Outlet
node.description: A multitude of shipping crates and shelves surround the small shop with all manner of supplies available to those visiting the society. When not tending to the needs of visiting artisans, an elderly Elven woman sorts supplies from behind a makeshift counter.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Workroom
node.description: Gleaming marble mingles with brilliant alexandrite and laced agates to create an ornate mosaic underfoot, culminating in a radiant star design that surrounds the central brazier. Gradient hues of blue cover the sandstone walls, darkening as they spread to the domed ceiling of the workroom. A multitude of tzgaa stars hang overhead, creating the vague illusion of a starlit night sky, while still providing enough illumination for enchanters to work their craft.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Workroom
node.description: Brilliant veins of golden beryl and fire agate mingle amid a vibrant sunset mural painted along the surrounding sandstone walls of the small workroom. Underfoot, polished marble creates an ornately patterned design that encompasses the enchanter's brazier at the center of the room, awash with the glow from the sun-hued tzgaa orbs overhead.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Workroom
node.description: Gradient hues of rich purple swirl amid brilliant bands of orchid alexandrites and violet amber along the sandstone walls, creating a mesmerizing wash of color throughout the small workroom. An enchanter's brazier stands at the center of the room, illuminated by the marbled gaethzen spheres overhead.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, Workroom
node.description: Fiery hues of red, orange and yellow marble mingle with brilliant carnelian and citrine to create an ornate mosaic underfoot, culminating in a radiant fire design that surrounds the central brazier. Similar gradients cover the painted sandstone walls, punctuated by gleaming gaethzen orbs overhead that provide a generous amount of light for enchanters to work their craft.

node.name: Muspar'i, Records Office
node.description: S'Kra Mur clerks toil away inside a cramped room, made to seem far smaller thanks to mounted wall racks loaded with yellowed vellum scrolls, stacks of parchment sheaves piled in the corners, and decoratively carved oak desks -- ornamentation strikingly unusual in bureaucratic offices. A door, sealed by an iron bar, leads deeper into the building, perhaps for additional paper storage. On the opposite side of the room, an archway leads back to the streets outside.
S'Kra Mur clerks toil away inside a cramped room. On the opposite side of the room, an archway leads back to the streets outside.

node.name: Muspar'i, Carousel Family Services
node.description: A series of guarded arches line the southern wall. The complicated framework of iron and timbers spans across the ceiling. Countless gears, pulleys and weights form the strikingly complex mechanism which drives the Carousel.
Guarded arches line the southern wall. The complicated framework spans the ceiling and supports the gears, pulleys and weights that drive the Carousel's mechanisms.

node.name: Muspar'i, Family Vault
node.description: A Dwarven attendant stands near the entry, doing his best to ignore you but seeming anxious. A wooden platform sits in the middle of the room, and a complicated series of gears, rope and other mechanisms are focused around it.

node.name: Muspar'i, Family Vault
node.description: A Dwarven attendant stands near the entry, doing his best to ignore you but seeming anxious. A wooden platform sits in the middle of the room, and a complicated series of gears, rope and other mechanisms are focused around it.

node.name: Muspar'i Outfitting Society, A Private Outfitting Room
node.description: A pure-white wainscoted hall is topped by lilac-hued paisley painted walls. Occupying the back third of the room is a solid-looking loom, while a large spinning wheel sits near the entrance. Resting atop a deep purple rug is a sturdy worktable and a comfortable, wicker chair. Running parallel along opposing walls are several hooks and shelves, holding practically every conceivable tool, spool of thread, bobbin, thimble and scrap.

node.name: Muspar'i Forging Society, A Private Forge
node.description: Thick walls struggle to contain the blistering heat of the workshop where the fires blaze endlessly night and day. The flickering flames give a reddish glow to the racks and shelves of tools and equipment, all neatly placed and ready for use. Workers enter in their protective gear from time to time, checking the equipment and reporting back to a sentry at the entry.

node.name: Muspar'i Enchanting Society, A Private Enchanting Room
node.description: Pieced together by a seemingly blind worker, the walls are covered with scraps of rugs, blankets, and carpets in a kaleidoscope of colors. A burly, light pink feldspar table is stashed in a corner of the room, providing plenty of room to work.

node.name: Muspar'i Alchemy Society, A Private Alchemy Room
node.description: A large workbench dominates one side of the room with numerous pieces of alchemical equipment scattered haphazardly upon its surface. The high, vented windows provide relief from the common, yet unpleasant, smell that permeates the room.

node.name: Muspar'i Engineering Society, A Private Engineering Room
node.description: A fine layer of wood and stone shavings covers most of the well-worn granite floor. The white walls have seen better days, and black and grey scuff marks adorn much of the open space. A large workstation along one wall is unnaturally free of clutter and holds several organized tools and implements. Grunts, curses, and labored breathing from other patrons echo throughout the large workroom.

node.name: Muspar'i, Rundmolen Post Office
node.description: Tucked up against the limestone building is a low stone counter made from pale tan sandstone. Carved sandalwood screens section off the area from the bustling square beyond. Vast, countless rows of differently sized shelves are behind the counter, and complex Dwarven mechanisms can be heard as they rearrange the package-covered storage. Clerks shuffle endlessly back and forth between the counters and shelving as they assist patrons with their packaging and mailing needs.
